languages.text: {n}Лицо хормейстера мрачнеет. Он долго молчит, обратив взор к полу. Наконец, поднимает лицо к вам. Его изъеденный морщинами лик расслабляется, принимая благоговейное выражение, а губ коснулась улыбка.{/n} "Да будет так, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо хормейстера мрачнеет. Он долго молчит, обратив взор к полу. Когда вы уже собираетесь его окликнуть, он наконец поднимает лицо к вам. Его изъеденный морщинами лик наконец расслабился, приняв благоговейное выражение. Его губ коснулась улыбка.{/n} "Да будет так, Ваша Светлость".

languages.text: {n}The Choirmaster's face grows gloomy. For a long time, he stares at the floor, saying nothing. Finally, he raises his head to look at you. His much-wrinkled face is relaxed. A reverent expression has come over it, and there is a hint of a smile on his lips.{/n} "So be it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо хормейстера мрачнеет. Он долго молчит, обратив взор к полу. Наконец, поднимает лицо к вам. Его изъеденный морщинами лик расслабляется, принимая благоговейное выражение, а губ коснулась улыбка.{/n} "Да будет так, Ваша Светлость".

languages.text: {n}El rostro del maestro del Coro se ensombrece. Durante un largo rato, mantiene la cabeza gacha sin decir palabra. Finalmente, alza los ojos para mirarte. Su cara arrugada está relejada. La reverencia domina su expresión, y ves el deje de una sonrisa en sus labios.{/n} «Que así sea, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's face grows gloomy. For a long time, he stares at the floor, saying nothing. Finally, he raises his head to look at you. His much-wrinkled face is relaxed. A reverent expression has come over it, and there is a hint of a smile on his lips.{/n} "So be it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro del maestro del Coro se ensombrece. Durante un largo rato, mantiene la cabeza gacha sin decir palabra. Finalmente, alza los ojos para mirarte. Su cara arrugada está relejada. La reverencia domina su expresión, y ves el deje de una sonrisa en sus labios.{/n} «Que así sea, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}クワイアーマスターの表情が暗くなる。長い間、何も言わずに床を見つめていた。やっと、男は頭を上げてこちらを見た。男のしわだらけの顔を緩ませている。尊敬の混じった表情で、唇にはほのかに笑みを浮かべている。{/n}「あなたのお心のままに、我が陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's face grows gloomy. For a long time, he stares at the floor, saying nothing. Finally, he raises his head to look at you. His much-wrinkled face is relaxed. A reverent expression has come over it, and there is a hint of a smile on his lips.{/n} "So be it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}クワイアーマスターの表情が暗くなる。長い間、何も言わずに床を見つめていた。やっと、男は頭を上げてこちらを見た。男のしわだらけの顔を緩ませている。尊敬の混じった表情で、唇にはほのかに笑みを浮かべている。{/n}「あなたのお心のままに、我が陛下」

languages.text: {n}唱诗大师的脸色变得阴沉下来。他默默地盯着地板，一言不发。过了很久很久，他抬起头看着你，皱纹遍布的脸显得无比轻松，脸上浮现出了虔诚的表情，甚至连嘴角都露出了一丝笑容。{/n}“那就这么办吧，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's face grows gloomy. For a long time, he stares at the floor, saying nothing. Finally, he raises his head to look at you. His much-wrinkled face is relaxed. A reverent expression has come over it, and there is a hint of a smile on his lips.{/n} "So be it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}唱诗大师的脸色变得阴沉下来。他默默地盯着地板，一言不发。过了很久很久，他抬起头看着你，皱纹遍布的脸显得无比轻松，脸上浮现出了虔诚的表情，甚至连嘴角都露出了一丝笑容。{/n}“那就这么办吧，大人。”

languages.text: {n}Die Miene des Chormeisters verdüstert sich. Lange Zeit starrt er schweigend zu Boden. Schließlich hebt er den Kopf, um dich anzusehen. Sein runzliges Gesicht ist völlig entspannt. Ein ehrfürchtiger Ausdruck hat sich darüber gelegt und ein Lächeln umspielt seine Lippen.{/n} "So sei es, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's face grows gloomy. For a long time, he stares at the floor, saying nothing. Finally, he raises his head to look at you. His much-wrinkled face is relaxed. A reverent expression has come over it, and there is a hint of a smile on his lips.{/n} "So be it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Miene des Chormeisters verdüstert sich. Lange Zeit starrt er schweigend zu Boden. Schließlich hebt er den Kopf, um dich anzusehen. Sein runzliges Gesicht ist völlig entspannt. Ein ehrfürchtiger Ausdruck hat sich darüber gelegt und ein Lächeln umspielt seine Lippen.{/n} "So sei es, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}Le visage du maître de chœur se renferme. Il observe longuement le sol à ses pieds, sans mot dire, puis il relève la tête pour vous regarder. Parfaitement détendu, son visage sillonné de rides affiche à présent une expression révérencieuse et l'ombre d'un sourire danse sur ses lèvres.{/n} « À votre guise, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's face grows gloomy. For a long time, he stares at the floor, saying nothing. Finally, he raises his head to look at you. His much-wrinkled face is relaxed. A reverent expression has come over it, and there is a hint of a smile on his lips.{/n} "So be it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage du maître de chœur se renferme. Il observe longuement le sol à ses pieds, sans mot dire, puis il relève la tête pour vous regarder. Parfaitement détendu, son visage sillonné de rides affiche à présent une expression révérencieuse et l'ombre d'un sourire danse sur ses lèvres.{/n} « À votre guise, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Koro Şefi'nin yüzünü kasvet kaplıyor. Uzunca bir süre hiçbir şey söylemeden yere bakıyor. En nihayetinde sana bakmak için kafasını kaldırıyor. Kırış kırış olmuş yüzünde rahatlamış görünüyor. Hürmetkâr bir ifadeye bürünmesinin yanı sıra dudaklarında hafif bir gülümseme seçiliyor.{/n} "Öyle olsun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's face grows gloomy. For a long time, he stares at the floor, saying nothing. Finally, he raises his head to look at you. His much-wrinkled face is relaxed. A reverent expression has come over it, and there is a hint of a smile on his lips.{/n} "So be it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
